subtasks.name: Plot Development
subtasks.description: Outline the main events and structure of the story, including the story arc and subplots.

subtasks.name: Character Creation
subtasks.description: Develop well-rounded characters, focusing on backstories, motivations, and relationships.

subtasks.name: Setting
subtasks.description: Establish the time and place of the story, including specific details that enhance the narrative.

subtasks.name: Conflict
subtasks.description: Identify main and secondary conflicts that drive the narrative; ensure resolution ties with character development.

subtasks.name: Theme Exploration
subtasks.description: Determine central themes or messages and ensure connection between characters, plot, and setting.

subtasks.name: Drafting and Revising
subtasks.description: Write the first draft and revise for clarity, seeking feedback for improvement.
